welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, where Southern charm meets modern living. Explore our quaint neighborhoods, rich history, and vibrant culture. We can't wait for you to experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jacksonville NAS Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Jacksonville NAS Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained at the information desk.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jacksonville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Jacksonville Airport serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Jacksonville Airport serves domestic flights operated by United and Southwest.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Craig Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Augustine Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at St Augustine Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
